name: List comments in a repository

params.name: direction
params.description: Either `asc` or `desc`. Ignored without the `sort` parameter.

params.name: since
params.description: Only comments updated at or after this time are returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

description: By default, Issue Comments are ordered by ascending ID.
